hackathons.name: DandyHacks '23
hackathons.description: Developed a campus navigation app that factors in weather and tunnel routes.

photos.caption: Working on our project at DandyHacks

projects.name: RocMap
projects.tagline: U of R's very own map navigator, tunnels and weather included!
projects.description: RocMap takes data of the starting and ending points from user's input and creates the most optimal route map, with images and instructions included, to navigate users to their desired destinations. It also calculates the distance and time depending on the weather conditions, thereby suggesting the shortest and most efficient path to get there.

hackathons.name: BrickHack X
hackathons.description: Created an AI-powered dining assistant to enhance campus dining experiences.

photos.caption: Demoing our project at BrickHack X

projects.name: dAIningRIT
projects.tagline: Dining halls meet AI, at RIT!
projects.description: dAIningRIT is an AI-powered mobile web app that aims to make college dining more enjoyable. By combining already made ingredients in the dining hall, students can create virtually any dish they desire, increasing enjoyment and reducing food waste.

hackathons.name: YHACK 2024
hackathons.description: Developed an eye-tracking powered classroom assistant to enhance student engagement.

projects.name: EduVision
projects.description: EduVision is a dynamic website that utilizes eye gazing technology and AI chatbots to enhance classroom engagement. Through the integration of eye tracking capabilities, the platform accurately detects and analyzes students' gaze patterns, allowing educators to notice confusing topics, gauge their attentiveness, and adjust their teaching accordingly.

hackathons.name: TikTok TechJam 2024
hackathons.description: Developed an AI-powered trip planner that transforms TikTok videos into personalized travel itineraries.

projects.name: SwipeAndFly
projects.tagline: Plan your next memories, with TikTok
projects.description: SwipeAndFly analyzes TikTok videos to extract travel inspiration and uses AI to generate personalized itineraries, making trip planning engaging and efficient.

hackathons.name: HopHacks Fall 2024
hackathons.description: Developed 'Young Heroes', a safe and accessible 911 call simulation platform for kids.

photos.caption: The moment we found out we won!
Accepting our 3rd place prize at HopHacks

projects.name: Young Heroes
projects.tagline: Safe & Accessible 911 call simulation platform for kids.
projects.description: Young Heroes is a mobile app designed to create a safe and accessible space for children aged 4 to 12. It empowers kids to recognize critical situations and communicate effectively with 911 when needed. The app offers an end-to-end simulation where kids can interactively communicate with a 911 dispatcher in real-time using generative AI, providing realistic practice and learning experiences unmatched by other platforms.

hackathons.name: CalHacks 11.0
hackathons.achievement: People's Choice Award & VAPI: Best use of Voice AI
hackathons.description: Developed an AI-powered extended reality study assistant to enhance personalized learning experiences.

photos.caption: Visit to Apple HQ during CalHacks
Winner of the VAPI API prize

projects.name: TeachXR
projects.tagline: World's First AI Study Assistant in Extended Reality
projects.description: TeachXR is an immersive AI tutor that allows students to interact with study materials in extended reality, providing personalized assistance and enhancing engagement.
achievements: VAPI: Best use of Voice AI

hackathons.name: HackUMass XII
hackathons.description: Developed 'Xplore It', an AI-powered XR assistant that provides real-time, personalized guidance for various tasks, enhancing user engagement and learning.

photos.caption: Bereal demoing our project at HackUMass

projects.name: Xplore It
projects.tagline: Effortless Task Mastery with Personalized XR Helper
projects.description: Xplore It is a fully interactive XR assistant designed to help users tackle any task, even those without specific online tutorials. It offers voice interaction, visual task guidance, and human-like engagement to provide tailored, step-by-step instructions.

hackathons.name: HackUTD 2024: Ripple Effect
hackathons.description: Developed 'Realty Wingman', an AI assistant for real estate agents to enhance house visits with real-time emotion and attention analysis.

projects.name: Realty Wingman
projects.tagline: AI assistant for realty agents during house visits
projects.description: Realty Wingman is a cutting-edge mobile app that revolutionizes the home-buying process. By leveraging real-time AI-powered emotion detection, eye-tracking, facial expression analysis, and voice tone recognition, it gives realtors a crystal-clear view of what potential buyers are truly feeling. As buyers explore a property, the app tracks where they're looking, listens to their comments, and analyzes their tone, all while capturing video footage. At the end of each showing, realtors receive a comprehensive summary, including key highlights of buyer interest and areas of hesitation, enabling them to tailor their follow-ups and provide a hyper-personalized experience.

hackathons.name: Bitcamp 2025
hackathons.description: Developed 'DMPN', a real-time productivity tracker and gamified platform to monitor and enhance developers' focus and efficiency.

projects.name: DMPN: Developer Monitoring & Productivity Nexus
projects.tagline: Find your Developer Aura - Compete to be the Sigma Dev
projects.description: DMPN is an aura tracker that provides live feedback on developers' focus and productivity during coding sessions. It analyzes webcam images and screen captures in real-time using OpenAI's vision models to generate productivity scores, which are visualized in clean UIs. The platform also features 'Aura Battles,' an elo-based matchmaking system for developers to compete and showcase their productivity.
